question: Can men use cream to remove unwanted hair?
answer:
QUESTION

Dear Imam sb, Pls advise as i heard that removing unwanted here for men is prohibted throug creams etc and men can use only razor, also inform what is orders for men

Regards

ANSWER


Share:

In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful  

Assalaamu `alaykum waRahmatullahi Wabarakatoh

It is permissible fro men to remove unwanted hair by means of creams and other hair removing agents. (Hindiyyah vol.44 pg.24)

 

الفتاوى الهندية   - (ج 44 / ص )24

وَفِي الْإِبْطِ يَجُوزُ الْحَلْقُ وَالنَّتْفُ أَوْلَى وَيَبْتَدِئُ فِي حَلْقِ الْعَانَةِ مِنْ تَحْتِ السُّرَّةِ وَلَوْ عَالَجَ بِالنُّورَةِ فِي الْعَانَةِ يَجُوزُ كَذَا فِي الْغَرَائِبِ . .

And Allah knows best

Wassalam

Mufti Moosa Salie
